comment: just for the hell of it, added a bit of the dregs of a chimay bottle to the starter with the WLP550.
pitched at ~67F, let temp rise freely with fermenter sitting in shallow water bath to provide a slight cooling effect as it warms.
all sugar dissolved in water and added after initial fermentation, at which time the temperature is brought back below 70F before being allowed to rise again.

~25g dried rose buds added, with juice and zest of 2 lemons, following subsequent fermentation.
10g dried rose buds added to keg (after ~6 month aging).
